elements.name: Login user with incorrect email and password

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url

Click on Signup button
Verify 'Login to your account' is visible
Enter correct email address and password
Clicks 'login' button
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Logout user successfully

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on Signup button
Verify 'Login to your account' is visible
Enter correct email address and password
Clicks 'login' button
Verify that 'Logged in as username' is visible
Click the 'Logout' button
Verify that user is navigated to login page

Verify that home page is visible successfully

elements.name: Submit contact form with message and file upload

Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on 'Contact Us' button
Verify 'GET IN TOUCH' is visible
Enter name, email, subject and message
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Verify user can navigate to the Test Cases page successfully

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on 'Test Cases' button
Verify user is navigated to test cases page successfully
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Verify Subscription section functionality

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Scroll down to footer
Verify text 'SUBSCRIPTION'
Enter email address in input and click arrow button
Verify success message 'You have been successfully subscribed!' is visible
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Submit contact form with message and file upload

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on 'Contact Us' button
Verify 'GET IN TOUCH' is visible
Enter name, email, subject and message
Click the 'Submit' button
Click OK button
Verify success message 'Success! Your details have been submitted successfully.' is visible
Click 'Home' button and verify that landed to home page successfully
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Verify search functionality for products

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on 'Products' button
Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully
Enter product name in search input and click search button
Verify 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' is visible
Verify all the products related to search are visible

elements.name: Verify all products and product detail page functionality

steps.name: Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url
Verify that home page is visible successfully
Click on 'Products' button
Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully
The products list is visible
Click on 'View Product' of first product
User is landed to product detail page
Verify that product detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand
Finally i close the browserrr

elements.name: Retrieve user by ID

I send the GET HTTP request
I should receive a 200 status codes
I should see user details in the response

elements.name: Successfully create a user

steps.name: I set the POST endpoint for creating user
I prepare request body with name "morpheus" and job "leader"
I send a POST HTTP request
the response status codes should be 201
the response should contain the user ID and creation timestamp

elements.name: Put request to update user details

I send a PUT request to update the user with ID 2
I should receive a success response

elements.name: Patch request to partially update user details

I send a PATCH request to update the user with ID 2
I should receive a success response

elements.name: Delete request to remove user

steps.name: the API is up and running
I send a DELETE request to remove the user with ID 2
I should receive a success response
